snippet: Born to Italian immigrants in 1912, Editta Sherman photographed a who's who of stars in her lifetime. Today, on her 100th birthday, the Lens blog presents a collection of her portraits documenting celebrity of times past.
abstract: Born to Italian immigrants in 1912, Editta Sherman photographed a who's who of stars in her lifetime. Today, on her 100th birthday, the Lens blog presents a collection of her portraits documenting celebrity of times past.
